metadata.title: CVE-2014-2709 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
lib/rrd.php in Cacti 0.8.7g, 0.8.8b, and earlier allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in unspecifiedparameters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2709` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-5').
